Qualitative Stage 2 Trigger set (SBP)
Economic scenario to calculate the IFRS 9 PD

The benchmark (SBP) economic scenario used by the institution to calculate the IFRS 9 PD. The scenario ID shall be expressed as a value between 0 and 5.The economic scenario 1 shall be the baseline scenario. The economic scenarios 2 to 5 shall be ranked according to their severity, from the most favourable (number 2) to the most severe (number 5).
